meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ignoble.
meanings.sent1: His ignobleness was evident in the way he treated others with disrespect.
meanings.sent2: The ignobleness of his actions tarnished his reputation in the community.
meanings.sent3: Despite his ignobleness, he somehow managed to win the respect of his peers.
meanings.sent4: The shadow of ignobleness followed him wherever he went, like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: The ignobleness of his behavior left a lasting impression on everyone who witnessed it.

meanings.sent4: The ignobleness of the betrayal cut deeper than any sword.
meanings.sent5: The ignobleness of his words echoed in her mind long after he had left.
